attributes.action: Allow the public to undertake a general election.
attributes.additional_details: The conservative parted have consistently lost support and votes since 2016. Mrs May was only just re-elected in the last election and Mr Johnston, has not been put to a public vote and cannot be considered the public’s choice as Prime Minister.
attributes.background: Since the referendum in 2016, the leader of the government has been shown to be in a weakened position in the House of Commons, it’s time for a change. The public needs to have its voice heard again, and call a general election.
